name: Oasis (itch) (HTR[01])
description:
The Oasis awaits you...

A relaxing first person 3D exploration game. Will you be able to find the hidden secrets of The Oasis?

The Oasis features nine hidden secrets that you are able to find!

While you're enjoying your stay in The Oasis, be sure to make use of the inbuilt screenshot feature (tab) in order to share your enjoyable experience!

Oasis was made by a team of students over a course of 5 weeks.
